term.1: By clicking “Create Account”, you agree to our

signUp1.main_desc: Free membership and Next-day sample delivery service is opened to professionals in the architecture and design industry.
signUp1.email_desc: To facilitate quicker membership approval, please provide an email associated with your professional business.

signUp2.main_title: Tell us a little about yourself
signUp2.your_link: Your LinkedIn or Other Professional Link

signUp3.main_desc: Our platform is exclusively for interior design and architecture professionals. Please provide some information of the company you are affiliated with.
signUp3.link_desc: If you don't have a company website, please provide a link that demonstrates its connection to the industry.

company_expertise.main_title: What is your company's field of expertise?
company_expertise.main_desc: You can select more than 1 option.

type_of_client.main_title: What type of clients are you working with?
type_of_client.main_desc: You can select more than 1 option.

primary_work_in.main_title: Lastly, which professional sector do you primarily work in?
primary_work_in.main_desc: You can select up to 3 option.
